name: SAMHAINOPHOBIA
description:
A short horror experience made solo in 9 days for the Scream Jam 2021 using assets from the UE4 Marketplace.

Made in UE4

WARNING - Contains Mild Flashing Lights To Emulate Thunder

CONTROLS:

WASD to Move

Left Ctrl / C to Crouch

Left Shift to Run

Tab to Check Objectives

F to Toggle Flashlight

P / Esc to Open Pause Menu
